thread.title: NSYNC Isn't Reuniting Despite Lance Bass's Comments
thread.title_full: NSYNC Isn't Reuniting Despite Lance Bass's Comments

author: Just Jared
title: NSYNC Isn't Reuniting Despite Lance Bass's Comments
text:
We‚Äôre sorry to tear up your hearts with this news, but *NSYNC has clarified that they do not actually have new music or a tour planned for this year.
The rumor mill kicked into high gear after Lance Bass revealed that the former boyband would be celebrating their 20-year anniversary by reuniting to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, and dropping a vinyl re-release of their 1998 Home for Christmas album.
‚ÄúWe always appreciate the love and excitement from our fans unfortunately Lance ‚Äôs comments to the press were taken out of context,‚Äù the group tweeted from their official account on Friday (February 17). When there is real news from *NSYNC you will hear it from all of us.‚Äù
Joey Fatone also commented on the news, along with Lance himself.
Some news to lift your spirits up, though: Lance also shared that the group keeps in contact every day via a group text thread.
‚ÄúAll we do is bag on each other all day long,‚Äù he told Entertainment Tonight . ‚Äú Joey gets a lot of the brunt of our jokes. I mean, those guys are my brothers and so we act like immature brothers all the time.‚Äù
We always appreciate the love and excitement from our fans unfortunately Lance‚Äôs comments to the press were taken out of context. (1 of 2)
‚Äî *NSYNC (@NSYNC) February 17, 2017

We love the excitement from our fans.Lances comments to press were taken out of context,when there is real news u will hear from all of usüòä

Just to clarify. If people want to call the Walk Of Fame Star a "reunion" then fine, but we have no plans on making any new music or tour. üòú
‚Äî Lance Bass (@LanceBass) February 17, 2017
